title: OMM 06: Mindfulness at Work
dc:creator: Team Tham
description:
Today on OMM, Vikki and Natalie introduce a mindful approach to work.  Find out why many of the top global movers and shakers including Google, Facebook, Huffington Post and Linked In, turning their development focus ‘inward’ and onto to mindfulness based programs.  Learn some easy mindfulness practices that you and your team can get started Listen In

The post OMM 06: Mindfulness at Work appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
content:encoded:
Today on OMM, Vikki and Natalie introduce a mindful approach to work.  Find out why many of the top global movers and shakers including Google, Facebook, Huffington Post and Linked In, turning their development focus ‘inward’ and onto to mindfulness based programs.  Learn some easy mindfulness practices that you and your team can get started with immediately.

The post OMM 06: Mindfulness at Work appeared first on The Wellness Couch.
